message:
In America today, trafficking children has become more profitable than selling guns and easier than selling drugs. 83% of Sex Trafficking Victims in Americ are identified as U.S. Citizens that are being bought and sold by U.S Citizens. United States agencies estimate that:
•On average, 46 children – the equivalent of two average size classrooms – are lured by traffickers in the U.S. each day
•Only 1-2% of child trafficking victims are recovered
•The average victim’s age is 11 to 14 years old
•The average lifespan of a victim is 7 years

With your help, we can continue our programs that will keep children from disappearing, help bring children home, and hold traffickers accountable for their crimes. To donate click the link in our profile. Your help is appreciated and makes a difference!
https://www.erasechildtrafficking.org
